   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(tracer_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: %%%
   24: %%% Tests the tracer module interface
   25: %%%
   26: 
   27: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   29: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   31: -export([load/1, unload/1, reload/1, invalid_tracers/1]).
   32: -export([send/1, recv/1, call/1, call_return/1, spawn/1, exit/1,
   33:          link/1, unlink/1, getting_linked/1, getting_unlinked/1,
   34:          register/1, unregister/1, in/1, out/1, gc_start/1, gc_end/1,
   35:          seq_trace/1]).
   36: 
   37: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   38:             {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   39: 
   40: all() ->
   41:     trace_sessions:all().
   42: 
   43: groups() ->
   44:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()) ++
   45:         [{ basic, [], [send, recv, call, call_return, spawn, exit,
   46:                        link, unlink, getting_linked, getting_unlinked,
   47:                        register, unregister, in, out, gc_start, gc_end,
   48:                        seq_trace]}].
   49: 
   50: testcases() ->
   51:     [load, unload, reload, invalid_tracers, {group, basic}].
   52: 
   53: 
   54: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   55:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [local]),
   56:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, []),
   57:     purge(),
   58: 
   59:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   60: 
   61: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   62:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   63: 
   64: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   65:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
   66: 
   67: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
   68:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
   69: 
   70: 
   71: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC =:= load; TC =:= reload ->
   72: 
   73:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   74: 
   75:     Pid = erlang:spawn(fun F() ->
   76:                                receive
   77:                                    {get, Pid} ->
   78:                                        Pid ! DataDir,
   79:                                        F()
   80:                                end
   81:                        end),
   82:     register(tracer_test_config, Pid),
   83:     common_init_per_testcase(Config);
   84: init_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
   85:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
   86:     case catch tracer_test:enabled(trace_status, self(), self()) of
   87:         discard ->
   88:             ok;
   89:         _ ->
   90:             tracer_test:load(DataDir)
   91:     end,
   92:     common_init_per_testcase(Config).
   93: 
   94: common_init_per_testcase(Config) ->
   95:     Killer = erlang:spawn(fun() -> killer_loop([]) end),
   96:     register(killer_process, Killer),
   97:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config).
   98: 
   99: end_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC =:= load; TC =:= reload ->
  100:     purge(),
  101:     exit(whereis(tracer_test_config), kill),
  102:     kill_processes(),
  103:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config);
  104: end_per_testcase(_, Config) ->
  105:     purge(),
  106:     kill_processes(),
  107:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
  108: 
  109: kill_processes() ->
  110:     killer_process ! {get_pids,self()},
  111:     receive
  112:         {pids_to_kill,Pids} -> ok
  113:     end,
  114:     _ = [begin
  115:              case erlang:is_process_alive(P) of
  116:                  true ->
  117:                      io:format("Killing ~p\n", [P]);
  118:                  false ->
  119:                      ok
  120:              end,
  121:              erlang:unlink(P),
  122:              exit(P, kill)
  123:          end || P <- Pids],
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: killer_loop(Pids) ->
  127:     receive
  128:         {add_pid,Pid} ->
  129:             killer_loop([Pid|Pids]);
  130:         {get_pids,To} ->
  131:             To ! {pids_to_kill,Pids}
  132:     end.
  133: 
  134: kill_me(Pid) ->
  135:     killer_process ! {add_pid,Pid},
  136:     Pid.
  137: 
  138: 
  139: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
  140:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
  141: 
  142: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B) ->
  143:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B).
  144: 
  145: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
  146:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
  147: 
  148: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
  149:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
  150: 
  151: 
  152: %%% Test cases follow.
  153: 
  154: load(_Config) ->
  155:     purge(),
  156:     1 = erlang_trace(self(), true, [{tracer, tracer_test, []}, call]),
  157:     purge(),
  158:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, all, 0}, [],
  159:                              [{meta, tracer_test, []}]),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: unload(_Config) ->
  163: 
  164:     ServerFun = fun F(0, undefined) ->
  165:                         receive
  166:                             {N, Pid} -> F(N, Pid)
  167:                         end;
  168:                     F(0, Pid) ->
  169:                         Pid ! done,
  170:                         F(0, undefined);
  171:                     F(N, Pid) ->
  172:                         ?MODULE:all(),
  173:                         F(N-1, Pid)
  174:                 end,
  175: 
  176:     Pid = erlang:spawn_link(fun() -> ServerFun(0, undefined) end),
  177: 
  178:     Tc = fun(N) ->
  179:                  Pid ! {N, self()},
  180:                  receive done -> ok after 1000 -> ct:fail(timeout) end,
  181:                  trace_delivered(Pid)
  182:          end,
  183: 
  184:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [{tracer, tracer_test,
  185:                                   {#{ call => trace }, self(), []}},
  186:                                  call]),
  187:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, all, 0}, [], []),
  188: 
  189:     Tc(1),
  190:     receive _M -> ok after 0 -> ct:fail(timeout) end,
  191:     receive M0 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message0, M0}) after 0 -> ok end,
  192: 
  193:     code:purge(tracer_test),
  194:     code:delete(tracer_test),
  195: 
  196:     Tc(1),
  197:     receive M1 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message1, M1}) after 0 -> ok end,
  198: 
  199:     code:purge(tracer_test),
  200: 
  201:     Tc(1),
  202:     receive M2 -> ct:fail({unexpected_message2, M2}) after 0 -> ok end,
  203: 
  204:     ok.
  205: 
  206: %% This testcase is here to make sure there are not
  207: %% segfaults when reloading the current nifs.
  208: reload(_Config) ->
  209: 
  210:     Tracer = spawn_opt(fun F() -> receive _M -> F() end end,
  211:                        [{message_queue_data, off_heap}]),
  212:     erlang:link(Tracer),
  213:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun reload_loop/0),
  214: 
  215:     [begin
  216:          Ref = make_ref(),
  217:          State = {#{ call => trace }, Tracer, [Ref]},
  218:          erlang_trace(Tracee, true, [{tracer, tracer_test,State}, call]),
  219:          erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, all, 0}, []),
  220: 
  221:          false = code:purge(tracer_test),
  222:          {module, _} = code:load_file(tracer_test),
  223: 
  224:          %% There is a race involved in between when the internal nif cache
  225:          %% is purged and when the reload_loop needs the tracer module
  226:          %% so the tracer may be removed or still there.
  227:          case erlang_trace_info(Tracee, tracer) of
  228:              {tracer, []} -> ok;
  229:              {tracer, {tracer_test, State}} -> ok
  230:          end,
  231: 
  232:          false = code:purge(tracer_test),
  233:          true = code:delete(tracer_test),
  234:          false = code:purge(tracer_test),
  235:          timer:sleep(10)
  236:      end || _ <- lists:seq(1,15)],
  237: 
  238:     ok.
  239: 
  240: reload_loop() ->
  241:     ?MODULE:all(),
  242:     ?MODULE:all(),
  243:     ?MODULE:all(),
  244:     ?MODULE:all(),
  245:     ?MODULE:all(),
  246:     timer:sleep(1),
  247:     reload_loop().
  248: 
  249: invalid_tracers(_Config) ->
  250:     FailTrace = fun(A) ->
  251:                         try erlang_trace(self(), true, A) of
  252:                             _ -> ct:fail(A)
  253:                         catch _:_ -> ok end
  254:                 end,
  255: 
  256:     FailTrace([{tracer, foobar}, call]),
  257:     FailTrace([{tracer, foobar, []}, call]),
  258:     FailTrace([{tracer, make_ref(), []}, call]),
  259:     FailTrace([{tracer, lists, []}, call]),
  260: 
  261:     FailTP = fun(MS,FL) ->
  262:                      try erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,all,0}, MS, FL) of
  263:                             _ -> ct:fail({MS, FL})
  264:                         catch _:_ -> ok end
  265:                 end,
  266: 
  267:     FailTP([],[{meta, foobar}]),
  268:     FailTP([],[{meta, foobar, []}]),
  269:     FailTP([],[{meta, make_ref(), []}]),
  270:     FailTP([],[{meta, lists, []}]),
  271: 
  272:     ok.
  273: 
  274: 
  275: 
  276: send(_Config) ->
  277: 
  278:     Self = self(),
  279:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  280:                  Pid ! fun() -> Self ! ok end,
  281:                  receive ok -> ok after 100 -> ct:fail(timeout) end
  282:          end,
  283: 
  284:     Expect = fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  285:                      receive
  286:                          Msg ->
  287:                              {send, State, Pid, ok, Opts} = Msg,
  288:                              check_opts(EOpts, Opts, Self)
  289:                      end
  290:              end,
  291:     test(send, Tc, Expect).
  292: 
  293: 
  294: recv(_Config) ->
  295: 
  296:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  297:                  Pid ! ok
  298:          end,
  299: 
  300:     Expect = fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  301:                      receive
  302:                          Msg ->
  303:                              {'receive', State, Pid, ok, Opts} = Msg,
  304:                              check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  305:                      end
  306:              end,
  307: 
  308:     test('receive', Tc, Expect, false).
  309: 
  310: call(_Config) ->
  311: 
  312:     Self = self(),
  313:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  314:                  Pid ! fun() -> call_test(Self), Self ! ok end,
  315:                  receive ok -> ok after 100 -> ct:fail(timeout) end
  316:          end,
  317: 
  318:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, call_test, 1}, [], [local]),
  319: 
  320:     Expect = fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  321:                      receive
  322:                          Msg ->
  323:                              {call, State, Pid, {?MODULE, call_test, [Self]}, Opts} = Msg,
  324:                              check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  325:                      end
  326:              end,
  327:     test(call, Tc, Expect).
  328: 
  329: call_return(_Config) ->
  330: 
  331:     Self = self(),
  332:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  333:                  Pid ! fun() -> call_test(undefined), Self ! ok end,
  334:                  receive ok -> ok after 100 -> ct:fail(timeout) end
  335:          end,
  336: 
  337:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, call_test, 1}, [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}], [local]),
  338: 
  339:     Expect = fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  340:                      receive
  341:                          CallMsg ->
  342:                              {call, State, Pid, {?MODULE, call_test, [undefined]}, COpts} = CallMsg,
  343:                              check_opts(EOpts, COpts)
  344:                      end,
  345:                      receive
  346:                          RetMsg ->
  347:                              {return_from, State, Pid, {?MODULE, call_test, 1}, ROpts} = RetMsg,
  348:                              check_opts(EOpts, ROpts, undefined)
  349:                      end
  350:              end,
  351:     test(call, Tc, Expect).
  352: 
  353: call_test(Arg) ->
  354:     Arg.
  355: 
  356: spawn(_Config) ->
  357: 
  358:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  359:                  Pid ! fun() -> kill_me(erlang:spawn(lists,seq,[1,10])), ok end
  360:          end,
  361: 
  362:     Expect =
  363:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  364:                 receive
  365:                     Msg ->
  366:                         {spawn, State, Pid, NewPid, Opts} = Msg,
  367:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts, {lists,seq,[1,10]}),
  368:                         true = is_pid(NewPid) andalso NewPid /= Pid
  369:                 end
  370:              end,
  371: 
  372:     test(spawn, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  373: 
  374: exit(_Config) ->
  375:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  376:                  Pid ! fun() -> exit end
  377:          end,
  378: 
  379:     Expect =
  380:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  381:                 receive
  382:                     Msg ->
  383:                         {exit, State, Pid, normal, Opts} = Msg,
  384:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  385:                 end
  386:              end,
  387: 
  388:     test(exit, procs, Tc, Expect, true, true).
  389: 
  390: link(_Config) ->
  391: 
  392:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  393:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  394:                                SPid = erlang:spawn(fun() -> receive _ -> ok end end),
  395:                                erlang:link(SPid),
  396:                                ok
  397:                        end
  398:          end,
  399: 
  400:     Expect =
  401:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  402:                 receive
  403:                     Msg ->
  404:                         {link, State, Pid, NewPid, Opts} = Msg,
  405:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts),
  406:                         true = is_pid(NewPid) andalso NewPid /= Pid
  407:                 end
  408:              end,
  409: 
  410:     test(link, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  411: 
  412: unlink(_Config) ->
  413: 
  414:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  415:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  416:                                SPid = erlang:spawn(fun() -> receive _ -> ok end end),
  417:                                erlang:link(SPid),
  418:                                erlang:unlink(SPid),
  419:                                kill_me(SPid),
  420:                                ok
  421:                        end
  422:          end,
  423: 
  424:     Expect =
  425:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  426:                 receive
  427:                     Msg ->
  428:                         {unlink, State, Pid, NewPid, Opts} = Msg,
  429:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts),
  430:                         true = is_pid(NewPid) andalso NewPid /= Pid
  431:                 end
  432:              end,
  433: 
  434:     test(unlink, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  435: 
  436: getting_linked(_Config) ->
  437: 
  438:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  439:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  440:                                Self = self(),
  441:                                erlang:spawn(fun() -> erlang:link(Self) end),
  442:                                ok
  443:                        end
  444:          end,
  445: 
  446:     Expect =
  447:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  448:                 receive
  449:                     Msg ->
  450:                         {getting_linked, State, Pid, NewPid, Opts} = Msg,
  451:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts),
  452:                         true = is_pid(NewPid) andalso NewPid /= Pid
  453:                 end
  454:              end,
  455: 
  456:     test(getting_linked, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  457: 
  458: getting_unlinked(_Config) ->
  459:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  460:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  461:                                Self = self(),
  462:                                erlang:spawn(fun() ->
  463:                                                     erlang:link(Self),
  464:                                                     erlang:unlink(Self)
  465:                                             end),
  466:                                ok
  467:                        end
  468:          end,
  469: 
  470:     Expect =
  471:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  472:                 receive
  473:                     Msg ->
  474:                         {getting_unlinked, State, Pid, NewPid, Opts} = Msg,
  475:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts),
  476:                         true = is_pid(NewPid) andalso NewPid /= Pid
  477:                 end
  478:              end,
  479: 
  480:     test(getting_unlinked, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  481: 
  482: register(_Config) ->
  483: 
  484:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  485:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  486:                                erlang:register(?MODULE, self()),
  487:                                erlang:unregister(?MODULE),
  488:                                ok
  489:                        end
  490:          end,
  491: 
  492:     Expect =
  493:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  494:                 receive
  495:                     Msg ->
  496:                         {register, State, Pid, ?MODULE, Opts} = Msg,
  497:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  498:                 end
  499:              end,
  500: 
  501:     test(register, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  502: 
  503: unregister(_Config) ->
  504: 
  505:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  506:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  507:                                erlang:register(?MODULE, self()),
  508:                                erlang:unregister(?MODULE),
  509:                                ok
  510:                        end
  511:          end,
  512: 
  513:     Expect =
  514:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  515:                 receive
  516:                     Msg ->
  517:                         {unregister, State, Pid, ?MODULE, Opts} = Msg,
  518:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  519:                 end
  520:              end,
  521: 
  522:     test(unregister, procs, Tc, Expect, false).
  523: 
  524: in(_Config) ->
  525: 
  526:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  527:                  Self = self(),
  528:                  Pid ! fun() -> receive after 10 -> Self ! ok end end,
  529:                  receive ok -> ok end
  530:          end,
  531: 
  532:     Expect =
  533:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  534:                 N = (fun F(N) ->
  535:                              receive
  536:                                  Msg ->
  537:                                      {in, State, Pid, _, Opts} = Msg,
  538:                                      check_opts(EOpts, Opts),
  539:                                      F(N+1)
  540:                              after 0 -> N
  541:                              end
  542:                      end)(0),
  543:                 true = N > 0
  544:              end,
  545: 
  546:     test(in, running, Tc, Expect, false).
  547: 
  548: out(_Config) ->
  549:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  550:                  Pid ! fun() -> receive after 10 -> exit end end,
  551:                  Ref = erlang:monitor(process, Pid),
  552:                  receive {'DOWN', Ref, _, _, _} -> ok end
  553:          end,
  554: 
  555:     Expect =
  556:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  557:                 %% We cannot predict how many out schedules there will be
  558:                 N = (fun F(N) ->
  559:                              receive
  560:                                  Msg ->
  561:                                      {out, State, Pid, _, Opts} = Msg,
  562:                                      check_opts(EOpts, Opts),
  563:                                      F(N+1)
  564:                              after 0 -> N
  565:                              end
  566:                      end)(0),
  567:                 true = N > 0
  568:              end,
  569: 
  570:     test(out, running, Tc, Expect, false, true).
  571: 
  572: gc_start(_Config) ->
  573: 
  574:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  575:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  576:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
  577:                                ok
  578:                        end
  579:          end,
  580: 
  581:     Expect =
  582:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  583:                 receive
  584:                     Msg ->
  585:                         {gc_major_start, State, Pid, _, Opts} = Msg,
  586:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  587:                 end
  588:              end,
  589: 
  590:     test(gc_major_start, garbage_collection, Tc, Expect, false).
  591: 
  592: gc_end(_Config) ->
  593: 
  594:     Tc = fun(Pid) ->
  595:                  Pid ! fun() ->
  596:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
  597:                                ok
  598:                        end
  599:          end,
  600: 
  601:     Expect =
  602:         fun(Pid, State, EOpts) ->
  603:                 receive
  604:                     Msg ->
  605:                         {gc_major_end, State, Pid, _, Opts} = Msg,
  606:                         check_opts(EOpts, Opts)
  607:                 end
  608:              end,
  609: 
  610:     test(gc_major_end, garbage_collection, Tc, Expect, false).
  611: 
  612: seq_trace(_Config) ->
  613: 
  614:     seq_trace:set_system_tracer({tracer_test,
  615:                                  {#{ seq_trace => trace }, self(), []}}),
  616:     erlang:spawn(fun() ->
  617:                          seq_trace:set_token(label,17),
  618:                          seq_trace:set_token(print,true),
  619:                          seq_trace:print(17,"**** Trace Started ****")
  620:                  end),
  621:     receive
  622:         {seq_trace, _, 17, {print, _, _, _, _}, _} ->
  623:             ok;
  624:         M ->
  625:             ct:fail("~p~n",[M])
  626:     after 100 ->
  627:             ct:fail(timeout)
  628:     end.
  629: 
  630: test(Event, Tc, Expect) ->
  631:     test(Event, Tc, Expect, false).
  632: test(Event, Tc, Expect, Removes) ->
  633:     test(Event, Event, Tc, Expect, Removes).
  634: test(Event, TraceFlag, Tc, Expect, Removes) ->
  635:     test(Event, TraceFlag, Tc, Expect, Removes, false).
  636: test(Event, TraceFlag, Tc, Expect, _Removes, Dies) ->
  637: 
  638:     ComplexState = {fun() -> ok end, <<0:(128*8)>>},
  639:     Opts = #{ },
  640: 
  641:     %% Test that trace works
  642:     State1 = {#{ Event => trace }, self(), ComplexState},
  643:     Pid1 = start_tracee(),
  644:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid1, true, [TraceFlag, {tracer, tracer_test, State1}]),
  645:     Tc(Pid1),
  646:     ok = trace_delivered(Pid1),
  647: 
  648:     Expect(Pid1, State1, Opts),
  649:     receive M11 -> ct:fail({unexpected, M11}) after 0 -> ok end,
  650:     if not Dies andalso Event /= in ->
  651:             {flags, [TraceFlag]} = erlang_trace_info(Pid1, flags),
  652:             {tracer, {tracer_test, State1}} = erlang_trace_info(Pid1, tracer),
  653:             erlang_trace(Pid1, false, [TraceFlag]);
  654:        true -> ok
  655:     end,
  656: 
  657:     %% Test that trace works with scheduler id and timestamp
  658:     Pid1T = start_tracee(),
  659:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid1T, true, [TraceFlag, {tracer, tracer_test, State1},
  660:                                    timestamp, scheduler_id]),
  661:     Tc(Pid1T),
  662:     ok = trace_delivered(Pid1T),
  663: 
  664:     Expect(Pid1T, State1, Opts#{ scheduler_id => number,
  665:                                  timestamp => timestamp}),
  666:     receive M11T -> ct:fail({unexpected, M11T}) after 0 -> ok end,
  667:     if not Dies andalso Event /= in ->
  668:             {flags, [scheduler_id, TraceFlag, timestamp]}
  669:                 = erlang_trace_info(Pid1T, flags),
  670:             {tracer, {tracer_test, State1}} = erlang_trace_info(Pid1T, tracer),
  671:             erlang_trace(Pid1T, false, [TraceFlag]);
  672:        true -> ok
  673:     end,
  674: 
  675:     %% Test that  discard works
  676:     Pid2 = start_tracee(),
  677:     State2 = {#{ Event => discard }, self(), ComplexState},
  678:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid2, true, [TraceFlag, {tracer, tracer_test, State2}]),
  679:     Tc(Pid2),
  680:     ok = trace_delivered(Pid2),
  681:     receive M2 -> ct:fail({unexpected, M2}) after 0 -> ok end,
  682:     if not Dies andalso Event /= in ->
  683:             {flags, [TraceFlag]} = erlang_trace_info(Pid2, flags),
  684:             {tracer, {tracer_test, State2}} = erlang_trace_info(Pid2, tracer),
  685:             erlang_trace(Pid2, false, [TraceFlag]);
  686:        true ->
  687:             ok
  688:     end,
  689: 
  690:     ok.
  691: 
  692: check_opts(E, O, Extra) ->
  693:     check_opts(E#{ extra => Extra }, O).
  694: check_opts(#{ scheduler_id := number } = E, #{ scheduler_id := N } = O)
  695:   when is_integer(N) ->
  696:     E1 = maps:remove(scheduler_id, E),
  697:     O1 = maps:remove(scheduler_id, O),
  698:     if E1 == O1 -> ok;
  699:        true -> ct:fail({invalid_opts, E, O})
  700:     end;
  701: check_opts(Opts, Opts) ->
  702:     ok;
  703: check_opts(E,O) ->
  704:     ct:fail({invalid_opts, E, O}).
  705: 
  706: start_tracee() ->
  707:     spawn_link(
  708:       fun F() ->
  709:               receive
  710:                   Action when is_function(Action) ->
  711:                       case Action() of
  712:                           ok ->
  713:                               F();
  714:                           Err ->
  715:                               Err
  716:                       end;
  717:                   _ ->
  718:                       F()
  719:               end
  720:       end).
  721: 
  722: trace_delivered(Pid) ->
  723:     Ref = erlang:trace_delivered(Pid),
  724:     receive
  725:         {trace_delivered, Pid, Ref} ->
  726:             ok
  727:     after 1000 ->
  728:             timeout
  729:     end.
  730: 
  731: purge() ->
  732:     %% Make sure module is not loaded
  733:     case erlang:module_loaded(tracer_test) of
  734:         true ->
  735:             code:purge(tracer_test),
  736:             true = code:delete(tracer_test),
  737:             code:purge(tracer_test);
  738:         _ ->
  739:             ok
  740:     end.
